column1: Faye will be missed by her many special friends and acquaintances. She appreciated all those who cared for her this past year at Willow Springs
column3: and Toppenish Nursing and Rehabilitation Center. A viewing will be held at Valley Hills Funeral Home in Zillah on Thursday
column5: 2015 from 4:00 to 6:00 pm. Graveside services will be at the Zillah cemetery on Friday
